notes.title: Hey You today!
notes.message: What I would like to do is to leave behind  a sustainable entity of a set of companies that operate in an exemplary manner in terms of ethics, values and continue what our ancestors left behind.
notes.author: Mary Martin

notes.title: Evil Beliefs?
notes.message: People still believe what they read is necessarily the truth.
notes.author: Oscar Wilder

notes.title: Mad Wolrd
notes.message: All truth passes through three stages. First, it is ridiculed. Second, it is violently opposed. Third, it is accepted as being self-evident.
notes.author: MaD WorlD Foundation
